questions.question: What is the name of the famous movie directed by Quentin Tarantino?
questions.hint: It's a crime film with a non-linear narrative.
questions.explanation: Pulp Fiction is a 1994 American crime film written and directed by Quentin Tarantino.

questions.question: In what year was the movie 'The Silence of the Lambs' released?
questions.hint: It's a psychological thriller that won several Academy Awards.
questions.explanation: The Silence of the Lambs is a 1991 American psychological thriller film directed by Jonathan Demme.

questions.question: What is the name of the main character in the movie 'The Matrix'?
questions.hint: He's the protagonist of a science fiction film.
questions.explanation: Neo is the main character in the 1999 science fiction film The Matrix, played by Keanu Reeves.

questions.question: What is the name of the movie where Tom Hanks plays a character stranded on a deserted island?
questions.explanation: Cast Away is a 2000 American survival drama film directed by Robert Zemeckis, starring Tom Hanks.

questions.question: What is the name of the movie where Leonardo DiCaprio plays a character who survives a shipwreck?
questions.explanation: The Revenant is a 2015 historical drama film directed by Alejandro G. Iñárritu, starring Leonardo DiCaprio.

questions.question: What is the name of the movie where Tom Cruise plays a character who is a secret agent?
questions.explanation: Mission: Impossible is a 1996 American action spy film directed by Brian De Palma, starring Tom Cruise.

questions.question: What is the name of the movie where Julia Roberts plays a character who falls in love with a man she meets on a plane?
questions.explanation: Pretty Woman is a 1990 American romantic comedy film directed by Garry Marshall, starring Julia Roberts.

questions.question: What is the name of the movie where Denzel Washington plays a character who is a detective?
questions.explanation: Training Day is a 2001 American crime thriller film directed by Antoine Fuqua, starring Denzel Washington.

questions.question: What is the name of the movie where Meryl Streep plays a character who is a politician?
questions.explanation: The Iron Lady is a 2011 British biographical drama film directed by Phyllida Lloyd, starring Meryl Streep.

questions.question: What is the name of the movie where Johnny Depp plays a character who is a pirate?

answers.answer: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street

questions.explanation: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl is a 2003 American fantasy adventure film directed by Gore Verbinski, starring Johnny Depp.

questions.question: What is the name of the popular TV series set in the fictional town of Stars Hollow?
questions.explanation: Gilmore Girls is an American drama-comedy television series created by Amy Sherman-Palladino.

questions.question: What is the name of the TV series where the main character is a private investigator?
questions.explanation: Columbo is an American crime drama television series created by Richard Levinson and William Link.

questions.question: What is the name of the TV series where the main character is a superhero?
questions.explanation: Smallville is an American television series developed by Alfred Gough and Miles Millar.

questions.question: What is the name of the TV series where the main character is a detective?
questions.explanation: Psych is an American television series developed by Steve Franks.

questions.question: What is the name of the TV series where the main character is a doctor?
questions.explanation: House M.D. is an American television series developed by David Shore.

questions.question: What is the name of the TV series where the main character is a wizard?
questions.explanation: Hogwarts is not a TV series, but a fictional school in the Harry Potter book series.
